mapper.select: SELECT SUM(receivable_sum) AS receivableSum ,SUM(avg_room_rate) AS avgRoomRate, SUM(avg_consumption_of_room) AS avgConsumptionOfRoom,SUM(avg_consumption_of_person) AS avgConsumptionOfPerson, SUM(indemnity_income) AS indemnityIncome,SUM(free_check_in_sum) AS freeCheckInSum,SUM(room_sum) AS roomSum, SUM(maintain_room_sum) AS maintainRoomSum,SUM(member_room_sum) AS memberRoomSum, SUM(member_card_sold_money) AS memberCardSoldMoney,SUM(room_late_sum) AS roomLateSum, SUM(person_late_sum) AS personLateSum,SUM(commodity_revenues) AS commodityRevenues, SUM(room_rate_adjustment) AS roomRateAdjustment,SUM(occupancy_rate) AS occupancyRate,SUM(REVPAR) AS REVPAR, SUM(disable_room_sum) AS disableRoomSum,SUM(rental_income) AS rentalIncome, SUM(empty_room_sum) AS emptyRoomSum,SUM(hour_room_late_sum) AS hourRoomLateSum FROM `hm_management_report` WHERE hotel_id=#{hotelId} AND create_time <= #{endTime} AND create_time > #{startTime}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM `hm_room` WHERE `show`='yes' AND hotel_id = #{hotelId}

SELECT COUNT(per.id) FROM hm_order_child child LEFT JOIN hm_order oder ON oder.id=child.order_id LEFT JOIN hm_check_in_person per ON child.id=per.order_child_id WHERE oder.hotel_id=#{hotelId} and per.status='checkin' AND child.start_time < #{endTime} AND child.end_time >= #{startTime} AND ( child.order_state='admissions' OR child.order_state='notpaid' OR child.order_state='accomplish' )
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM `hm_check_in_person` WHERE create_time >= #{startTime} AND create_time < #{endTime}

SELECT COUNT(child.id) FROM hm_order_child child LEFT JOIN hm_order oder ON oder.id=child.order_id WHERE oder.hotel_id=#{hotelId} AND start_time < #{endTime} AND end_time >= #{startTime} AND ( order_state='admissions' OR order_state='notpaid' OR order_state='accomplish' ) AND oder.check_type='free'
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM hm_room WHERE room_state = 'yes' AND `show`='yes' AND hotel_id = #{hotelId}

SELECT COUNT(child.id) FROM hm_order_child child LEFT JOIN hm_order oder ON oder.id=child.order_id WHERE oder.hotel_id=#{hotelId} AND start_time < #{endTime} AND end_time >= #{startTime} AND ( order_state='admissions' OR order_state='notpaid' OR order_state='accomplish' ) AND members_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM hm_room WHERE lock_room_state = 'yes' AND `show`='yes' AND hotel_id = #{hotelId}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM hm_room WHERE room_major_state = 'vacant' AND `show`='yes' AND hotel_id = #{hotelId}
